frameDefinitions: In this frame a Theme moves in a certain Direction which is often determined by gravity or other natural, physical forces.
An Entity changes from a Prior_state to a Post_state in a sequence that follows a pre-defined plan, expectation, or model of change.
A Sleeper transitions from a state of consciousness where they are largely unaware of their environment to a wakeful state.
Two or more individuals have a relationship by virtue of belonging to the same organization or institution.
A Cognizer applies oneself to commit a Pattern to memory, so that the Cognizer would recognize future examples of the Pattern or be able to reproduce it.
An Astronomical_entity comes into view above the horizon as part of a regular, periodic process of (apparent) motion of the Astronomical_entity across the sky.
frameExamples: Their offensive armament has <t>developed</t> from short range missiles to long-range ballistic weaponry in a relatively short period .
A gaggle of students were frantically <t>memorizing</t> the answers out in the hall.
Venus <t>rose</t> at 5:23 AM, twenty minutes before the sun which reached the horizon at 5:43 AM.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the general <fen>Area</fen> in which motion takes place when the motion is understood to be irregular or not to consist of a single, linear path.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Theme</fen> ends up in (often unintentionally).
<fen>Path</fen> refers to (a part of) the ground over which the <fen>Theme</fen> travels  or to a landmark past which the <fen>Theme</fen> travels.
The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity that changes location.
The <fen>Source</fen> is the location the <fen>Theme</fen> occupies before the Motion occurs.
The direction of motion of the <fen>Theme</fen>.  <fen>Direction</fen> characterizes the <fen>Path</fen> of motion according to some system of orientation, most often that imposed by gravity.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Motion occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where motion specified by <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen> occurs.
The object that undergoes change.
The time at which the progress occurs.
The location where the Progress occurs.
This role identifies the sleeping entity.
This describes the state out of which the <fen>Sleeper</fen> awakens.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.
The profiled member of a co-association relationship.
The members of a Co-association relationship (collectively).
The backgrounded member(s) of a Co-association relationship.
The time during which the co-association relationship exists.
The place at which the Co-association relationship exists.
The sentient being that focuses on a <fen>Pattern</fen> so that it will remain in the memory.
The phenomenon that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> observes and commits to memory.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> memorizes the <fen>Pattern</fen>.
The location wherein the <fen>Cognizer</fen> memorizes the <fen>Pattern</fen>.
An entity which is periodically visible from the earth's surface.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Astronomical_entity</fen> appears.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> from which the motion of the <fen>Astronomical_entity</fen> is viewed.
listRoleExamples: Soot-contaminated snow falls <fex>in Slovakia's mountainous regions</fex>.
The rivals both fell backwards <fex>into empty space</fex>.
The boys plummeted <fex>down the stairs</fex> into the basement.
In 1977, <fex> Nigel</fex> plunged to his death in his car on a mountain road in southern France.
The man toppled <fex>from the passenger seat</fex> into the road.
I hope your egg does n't fall <fex>down</fex> .
<fex>In 1977</fex> Nigel plunged to his death in his car on a mountain road in southern France.
<fex>In the kitchen</fex>, the towel dropped onto the floor.
Advances <fex>in marketing techniques</fex> have since rendered it obsolete.
<fex>When</fex> did the X-wing progress beyond the drawing board?
He awoke <fex>out of a deep dream</fex>.
<fex>I</fex> have memorized two kinds of knowledge from Allah's Apostle
Impress your friends by memorizing <fex>your phone numbers</fex> and throwing away your PDA!
Herbert Kornfeldt memorized his speech <fex>in the mailroom</fex>.
Heku left one morning as <fex>the sun</fex> rose along the plain.
As the sun came up <fex>at 5:15 am</fex>, it made the red rocks almost glow.
The very end of the eclipse will be visible as the sun rises <fex>in some locations in Africa and northeastern North America</fex>.
